name: Blitz Bomber (Gameboy)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy. A game by: László Rajcsányi -  Wilds, 2021. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0-beta5 by Chris Maltby! This game is an entry for the Gameboy Competition 2021. (https://itch.io/jam/gbcompo21)

Original Story: Your beloved city has been attacked by enemy tanks. Only You can defeat them!

It’s an old game made in a whole new way!

Controls on original machine:

Start the game: Start
Drop bombs: A

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Enter
Drop bombs: Z
